body:
Not sure if I understand what these times mean:

rpict: 2901192699 rays, 87.19% after 50.244u 0.452s 53.318r hours on
RFG4.local

I started this render Friday eve - its been going for about 67 hours

What's the "u", "s" and "r"?

Rob F
